          <title>
            <string language="en">Boiling point</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Siedepunkt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Point d'ébullition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ponto fervendo</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the alcohol is boiling at 90 degrees Celsius while the water is not.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß der Spiritus bei 90 
Grad Celsius kocht, während das Wasser nicht ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'alcool bout à 90 
degrés de Celsius alors que l'eau n'est pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o álcool está 
fervendo em 90 graus Célsio quando a água não for.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'alcool sta 
bollendo centigrado a 90 gradi mentre l'acqua non è.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το οινόπνευμα βράζει 
σε 90 βαθμούς Κελσίου ενώ το ύδωρ δεν είναι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el alcohol está 
hirviendo en 90 grados de centígrado mientras que no es el agua.</string>
          </description>
